review.reviewBody: I feel extra safe in this harness. There is lots of padding and I can hang out in the harness comfortably for extended periods. I love the double belay loops; this should be the standard for all harnesses. There’s lots of extra carry room for equipment. I am currently using the harness indoors to train for multi-pitch outdoor climbing. I often load it like I am going on a long climb to build up my muscles and get used to the feel. The harness works great.
review.name: Excellent Harness

review.reviewBody: Provides lots of support with no pinch points. Still allows good free climbing mobility. Go to harness for trad climbing and big walls.
review.name: Great harness for big routes

review.reviewBody: I really like how comfortable is the harness, I used to have the Big Gun but this one is lighter but I feel the same sensation as that oldie . Amazing
review.name: The solid gear

review.reviewBody: Used a few times, seems to be comfortable, although I haven't done a hanging belay yet.
review.name: Comfy so far

review.reviewBody: Great fit and feel. Sturdy and light with all the adjustments needed.
review.name: Comfy

review.reviewBody: Really comfortable and easily adjustable. Love the fact that there are two belay loops for added security. My favorite harness
review.name: Best harness I've used

review.reviewBody: Out of the box wore it on The Nose then to Royal Arches then to the Crest Jewel with no harness rash. Highly recommend!🤘
review.name: Excellent!

review.reviewBody: I compared many harnesses with the long haul. I found myself always going back to the long haul harness. It fits well and provides support exactly where it is required. The gear loops are positioned in the correct places and naturally your hands find gear when required. The double belay loops complement each other and the infinity loops are one of the best features. It allowed the karabiners to move and flow freely. There is still enough space to tie in with either a single or double rope. The perfect all round harness
review.name: Comfort is not the word

review.reviewBody: It is big and bulky relatively but all-day comfort is a much higher priority for me. I love it.
review.name: Comfy!

review.reviewBody: I use it for trad climbing mostly . it is very functional and carries all you need no problem. has all the features I was looking for and very comfortable
review.name: Long Haul Harness

name: Long Haul Harness

description: Buy the Saris MHS 2+1 Receiver Base 2in Hitch online or shop all Bike from Backcountry.com.

hasVariant.name: MHS 2+1 Receiver Base 2in Hitch
hasVariant.description: Buy the Saris MHS 2+1 Receiver Base 2in Hitch online or shop all Bike from Backcountry.com.

review.reviewBody: the rack is very sturdy and heavily built (metal frame and wheel holders).  have had on the truck for 6 months now.  The only issue is the wheel straps are very week/thin plastic and snap off with any downward pressure.  I have had two of these break off.  Saris support is great and has ordered replacements, however like everything else these are on back order
review.name: overall good rack with a few issues

review.reviewBody: We purchased an E-bike for my wife and that was the good news. After having the bike delivered to us we discovered that our existing bike rack would not be compatible with the 60 lbs E-bike. After searching for an appropriate rack that would accommodate her bike I came across the Saris MHS rack. The rack itself is very heavy duty. It will easily fit both of our bikes very securely. With our previous rack I always kept one eye on the rear view mirror to watch the bikes to see if they were going to fall off. With the Saris MHS rack i can confidently drive with a knowledge that our bikes are very secure. This is a bike rack that will last us a long time. The customer service was very good with their advice on the different racks.
review.name: Great bike rack

review.reviewBody:
I've had the Saris MHS 2 bike rack system for over a month so far.  I've used it on a few trips and it is very solid.  It holds bikes well, is very well designed, heavy-duty (and feels it), has a nice integrated locking cable.  It should last forever.
 I previously had the Saris Superclamp 2.
The Superclamp was very light and worked with 1.25 receiver hitches but even thought the bikes were secure, the rack allows a lot of side to side hobby-horsing.  I like Saris racks because they use two wheel holders opposing each other instead of one because there is no frame or fork contact.
review.name: Sturdy well designed hitch system

name: MHS 2+1 Receiver Base 2in Hitch

review.reviewBody: I didn't think I would like these because of the shape. Turns out they are the most supportive/ comfortable flip-flops I have tried yet. i need another pair now.
review.name: Reef fanning

review.reviewBody: I have been wearing Reef Fanning for years and this pair is the fourth I have purchased. Unfortunately, my feet do not like this updated design. The strap (close to the toe and on the heel-facing side) on both shoes gave me blisters after 45-minute walk.
review.name: These gave me blisters

review.reviewBody: I have feet problem a few years ago when walking barefoot on hard wood floor inside a house. This shoes have been a solution for inside walking around the house. Now everyone in my family owns this shoes. The shoes give good cushion and stability. Shipping on motosport was quick. Thank you.

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: Have not yet put them through a true test in rain or snow. The fit is great. I have medium to low-ish profile feet and the width is fine with both a thiner and medium-thick sock. I wear a 7.5 - 8 and the 8 is perfect, true to size. They are a bit more shoe and beefier than I wanted, but I think that will pay off in warmth, wear, and weather protection,
review.name: Love the Look and Feel!

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: I’d been looking for a pair of lightweight, waterproof shoes for dog walking and hiking. I’m a fan of Oboz, (I own 2 other pairs) and these don’t disappoint! Comfortable, stable, stylish, and most of all, dry feet!!
review.name: Comfortable, stable and stylish!

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: i bought these..i have narrow feet and I took a hike straight away and had no issues, then went on a longer backpack and summited a 14er in them...no blisters or pain. Great shoes, would recommend!! I am usually a 9 but purchased a 9.5 and they are perfect
review.name: awesome comfortable hiking shoes

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: This is my 4th pair of the Oboz Sypes Low Leather B-Dry.  No need to break in, they are comfortable from day 1.  I also own a pair of Oboz Sypes ankle and they are also wonderful.  They last long for me.
review.name: Love Oboz Sypes

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: This is my 4th pair of Oboz but my first pair of hiking shoes (I've always worn hiking boots).  The shoes are just what I'd hope for from Oboz.  Great fit, great quality, and close to zero "breaking-in time".  I love my Oboz and Back Country is a terrific place to shop.
review.name: Great Hiking Shoes

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: I bought these for an upcoming hiking trip and I think these will be perfect. Lightweight, comfortable and functional.
review.name: Lightweight and Comfortable!

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: I bought these two months ago and wore them on a hiking trip recently. They felt comfortable when I first put them on but by the end of the day my toes were bumping the top of the shoe. I have narrow to medium feet and usually wear size 8 but in a hiking shoe I go to an 8.5. These were 8.5 I should have bought them in a 9. Worn so can’t return them so am going to donate them. I wasted $75.
review.name: Nice shoe but runs very small!!!

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: I wish these shoes came in a size wide, because they are so narrow and small that I feel like I'd need to go up at least 2 sizes from my regular size. Sadly I'll have to return. They seems like they'd be sturdy and comfortable and I like the color.
review.name: Very small and narrow

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: I had originally bought some Keens but returned those because they fell off my heel. These Oboz fit snuggly. I sized up a half a size and that was the right decision. They only took a day or two to break in and I'm confident that they'll be great on the trail and in the town.
review.name: Glad I purchased these

review.itemreviewed: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's
review.reviewBody: I do not wear this shoe hiking but on concrete floor at work all day. Replacing an ancient sawtooth the soles are stiffer and my feet are happier at the end of the day. They got more comfortable after breaking in. One star removed because they do rub on the side of one foot but a bit of electrical tape fixes it.
review.name: Great stiff soles

name: Sypes Low Leather B-DRY Hiking Shoe - Women's

review.reviewBody: I have not used this product, returning them due to size issues. It Is the most bizarre thing.  I have a 31" waist and am 6'1 and about 172lbs,  athletic build.. I  got an extra large based on their size chart.. the waist barely fit... but it did.... but  the legs are so big, baggy and too long... If you're tall and have huge legs, these will work for you, however, you must also have roughly a 30 inch waist and be at least 6'2" for the extra large in these to possibly work.  It's a shame because they look beautiful and are insulated, and all my Ortovox gear over the years has been great, so I'm sure these are awesome in the field!  but the sizing is just so odd.  Yes I could exchange for a large but then the waist wouldn't fit..and it's also not available.  Sad,  because these are normally so expensive and I got a great deal;  but just no way they would work for me.  I love Ortovox gear but their sizing can be very odd; especially with their pants.  I selected "runs small" but really they run small in the waist but large in the legs..
review.name: Look nice & durable by size way off

name: Guardian Shell 3L Pant - Men's

description: Buy the Mackage Madalyn V Down Jacket - Women's online or shop all Clothing from Backcountry.com.

hasVariant.name: Madalyn V Down Jacket - Women's
hasVariant.description: Buy the Mackage Madalyn V Down Jacket - Women's online or shop all Clothing from Backcountry.com.

review.reviewBody:
Lovely and warm jacket! Runs a little small, but it’s meant to be fitted. I wish it was a little less puffy, especially near my bottom. I took on star off because the material sadly stains very easily, the stains did not wash out and for the price point that wasn’t expected. I’ve had the jacket for a few months, I do not wear it daily. 
Not sure I’d recommend it due how easy it stains and the price point. If money is no issue I’d say, go for it.
review.name: Warm and Stylish

review.reviewBody: It’s a very nice coat and for the price should be made to prevent stains from settling into the fabric. I bought this coat less than 2 weeks ago. After wearing it out, I noticed a stain on it possibly from leaning on something or just interacting with the public during the day.  In the army color the stain is noticeable. I have washed it following the instructions but the stain is still too visible for the coat being at this price point. Definitely not an everyday jacket.
review.name: Very nice coat but stains easily

review.reviewBody:
Truthfully was shocked how warm
This coat is. It’s beautiful and stylish as well
review.name: Worth the price

review.reviewBody: love it it’s on of the best coats I ever had. The best
review.name: The best I ever had im in love with this coat love

review.reviewBody: I went to the location at Spring street in NY and Ashley was her name. She was so so helpful. I bought a coat years ago and loved the brand. She was so patient and helpful. She gave me her honest opinion and I love my coats!! If you are in the NY area please ask for her.
review.name: The stylist was the best!!!

review.reviewBody: My daughter loved her jacket perfect fit and arrived very quickly
review.name: Perfect fit

review.reviewBody: love the color and warmth however the coat runs small
review.name: the beautiful coat
comment:
Hi There,
Thank you for sharing your review with us.
The MADALYN is a fitted model - our closest to the body signature fit.
We're sorry to hear that the size you chose runs small on you.
Our sizes are generally quite accurate, however, seeing as we are all made differently not everyone will fit into a coat the same way.
Our size guide available on our site will give you a better idea of what size may be best for you.
Feel free to DM us if you have any further questions or concerns.
Cheers!

review.reviewBody:
This jacket is not true to size and trying to mail this item due to the holiday season . I ordered a small be cause I’m
Usually a size small but in this jacket I’m probably a m or large . I tried on a medium and it’s still very restricted in the boob and arm area . Like it might rip if I move too sudden . My height is 5’4 and 125 …wearing a large …make it make sense
review.name: Jacket is size way toooo small
comment:
Hi There!
Thank you for sharing your review with us.
We are sorry to hear that the coat you have purchased is too small on you.
Our sizes are generally quite accurate, however, seeing as we are all made differently in different areas it is quite understandable that not everyone will fit into a size the same way. 
Our size guide, available to the right of the image you select can help you determine the size appropriate for you.
If you have any further inquiries, please send us a DM and we will be delighted to assist you further.
Cheers!

review.reviewBody: a little tight but fit okay! very warm and cute. love the look.
review.name: amazing!

review.reviewBody: The Rab Glaceon Pro is a standout winter jacket, offering exceptional warmth and protection in harsh conditions without compromising on weight. I tested it in Wyoming’s high winds and a sudden snowstorm, where its 700FP down insulation and windproof Pertex® Quantum Pro fabric kept me warm and comfortable. The fit is true to size, with thoughtful features like a helmet-compatible hood and two-way zip making it ideal for climbing and mountaineering. Lightweight yet durable, this jacket is a reliable choice for anyone facing cold, demanding environments.
review.name: Reliable for winter mountaineering

name: Glaceon Pro Down Jacket - Women's

review.itemreviewed: Zermatt Shearling Lined Narrow Slipper - Women's
review.reviewBody:
I love these! Great buffer against our winter-time cold hardwood and tile floors. It is hard to find narrow slippers which is why I jumped on these and being Birkenstock was a bonus! The upper wool felt and shearling liner feel great. The sole is soft and pliable, so nothing to break in, but don't plan to wear them outdoors as the sole is silicone....waterproof but not an outdoor shoe sole. Maybe to check the mail now and then, but otherwise and indoor slipper. 

My only complaint was the shipping was ridiculously slow, 9 Days... but since they were for me and not a gift, not a huge issue.
review.name: cozy and perfect fit for narrow foot

name: Zermatt Shearling Lined Narrow Slipper - Women's
